tweets.text:
Here we go, neighbors! It's #CityHallSelfie Day with @ELGL50!
Today also kicks off BC's annual #ColorTheCreek event, so we are going to selfie with as many murals as possible. 🎨
Starting downtown on the Battle Creek River by Birdseed Anthony. Had to match it, too. 😄 -Jessica https://t.co/gy8ipYsoGY

@DurhamExtension’s KVD took a field trip to @dcovotes today so we were able to fit two great @DurhamCounty departments on one #CityHallSelfie  #DCoRocks because it makes our democracy possible! https://t.co/vNvTH54Qlc
City Legal Department #CityHallSelfie https://t.co/M6fUQDfaHN

It's #CityHallSelfie Day! You can join in on the fun by taking a picture of yourself or a group in front of one of our local government buildings, and share it on your social media using the #CityHallSelfie hashtag and tagging @cityoftopeka.

Learn more: https://t.co/FxbTJ4FJ3m. https://t.co/KUk4xmPAt1
Rise and grind, its #CityHallSelfie time in #Athens @accgov!! https://t.co/4AtywRT6Lr

Happy #CityHallSelfie Day to all those who celebrate!*

*it's you — you should celebrate https://t.co/2iDWILqewG
@Josh_Edwards11 @GeorgiaFootball @ELGL50 @SEELGL @AlisonEBM @AltonStandifer @universityofga @DrZeemering Famous Person vote! Gonna steal this idea for next year :)

The Gaithersburg Parks & Rec Staff took #CityHallSelfie Day to new heights by grabbing a shot on the roof of the Activity Center at Bohrer Park! 

@CityHallSelfie @ELGL50 https://t.co/fL90bWAtTK

Hairy Dawg knows how to celebrate #CityHallSelfie Day! Honored to spend time talking #localgov and upcoming @GeorgiaFootball season. Thanks for all you do for #Athens #GoDawgs Hairy Dawg. https://t.co/QGdswk28Fc
Michigan’s capital city is surrounded by 4 charter townships including @DeltaTownship @ELGL50 #CityHallSelfie https://t.co/cv6BcwoGcw
